You can reset your launchpad on Yosemite using Sorty.

Reset Your Launchpad on Yosemite

Terminal? No.

Sorty? Yes.

Sorty

Sorty can easily reset your Launchpad items to default and remove duplicate entries in the ‚ÄòOpen With’ menu.

This application has an easy to use and intuitive interface, with only two buttons: reset launchpad and remove duplicates in the ‚ÄòOpen With’ menu.

Copyright wiles.dk.

You know, I just don’t think this app is getting enough recognition.

I see so many Launchpads that are disorganized and cluttered.

Thank goodness this wiles.dk dude did something about it!

There are Launchpads that look like this:

If only it could go back to its default settings and look pretty again, like the Launchpad below‚Ä¶ üòâ

Hah - hey pal, don’t even worry ‘bout it!

Just download Sorty!

Smile, for goodness sakes!

This app can do wonders for you!

No more manual dragging!

All your worries are over!!

Automate everything!!!

So go ahead, make your worries go away!

You downloaded it, right?

Wait, why didn’t you download it?
